argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clm0.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | clmsub.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsca | |- ( W e. CMod -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( W e. CMod -> ( invg ` F ) = ( invg ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> ( invg ` F ) = ( invg ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( invg ` F ) ` A ) = ( ( invg ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ` A ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsubrg | |- ( W e. CMod -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_subrgsubg | |- ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CMod -> K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( CCfld |`s K ) = ( CCfld |`s K ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` CCfld ) = ( invg ` CCfld ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) = ( invg ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_subginv | |- ( ( K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` A ) = ( ( invg ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ` A ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` A ) = ( ( invg ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ` A ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsscn | |- ( W e. CMod -> K C_ CC ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_sselda | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 17 |  | #P_cnfldneg | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` A ) = -u A ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` A ) = -u A ) |
| 19 | 6, 14, 18 | #P_3eqtr2rd | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> -u A = ( ( invg ` F ) ` A ) ) |
